DOC.brief_summary: Verify follow blood glucose monitoring system : - precision accuracy versus YSI reference - user evaluation - labeling comprehension
DOC.brief_title: Blood Glucose Monitoring System Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Be diagnose Diabetes Be 12 70 year age Be able read , write , understand English Be able willing give Informed Consent Have use SMBG meter system least one year Be currently test blood glucose level least per day Inability provide Informed Consent Subject meet Inclusion Criteria Subject agree test infectious disease per clinical protocol Subject minimally one positive test infectious disease list Exclusion Criteria per protocol Subject condition ( addition list prescreen Exclusion Criteria test ) opinion Investigator may place subject site personnel excessive risk Subject 's physical condition/limitation prevents person use BGMS
